/* Christian views */ Niether Orthodox nor Catholic nor Mormons represented, the section is only about Protestants

This material is sourced, and makes a good faith effort to present both sides of the issue. Only Kay is reported as characterizing the group as fundamentalist, using a particular technical definition
difficult to establish beyond doubt that this organisation is fundamentalist in its approach - highly debatable, at least, and therefore inappropriate - possibly libellous - in this article.
